title: Stranger Things
description: A group of young friends in a small town uncover a series of supernatural mysteries involving secret government experiments, a mysterious girl with powers, and a parallel dimension called the Upside Down.
creator: The Duffer Brothers
awards: Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series

title: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind known as 'The Professor' recruits eight skilled thieves to carry out an ambitious plan: to infiltrate the Royal Mint of Spain and print billions of euros, all while dealing with hostages and law enforcement.
creator: Álex Pina
awards: International Emmy Award for Best Drama Series

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer partners with a former student to secure his family's future, while battling crime and his own moral decline.
creator: Vince Gilligan

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys through a turbulent world where people often prove more wicked than beasts. Based on the best-selling fantasy series.
creator: Lauren Schmidt Hissrich
awards: Saturn Award for Best Streaming Fantasy Series

title: Dark
description: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families and uncovers a time travel conspiracy.
creator: Baran bo Odar, Jantje Friese
